semantic_identifier: [GOLD-1]: Fix CSV import field mapping/type coercion causing incorrect fit score inputs
title: Fix CSV import field mapping/type coercion causing incorrect fit score inputs

sections.text: CSV imports for fit_estimation can incorrectly coerce field types (e.g., numeric fields treated as strings/booleans) or apply the wrong column mapping, leading to invalid inputs for scoring and misleading driver breakdowns. Update the import pipeline to validate mappings, normalize types deterministically, and surface row-level errors for unmappable values instead of silently defaulting. Ensure the normalized values are what the scoring service consumes for subsequent fit score calculations.
